awd_titl_txt: Purchase of a Mass Spectrometer with Accessories
awd_abstract_narration: Mass spectral techniques such as Electron Impact (EI), Chemical                 Ionization (CI) and Fast Atom Bombardment (FAB) are used to                     probe intimate structural details and to obtain the molecular                   compositions of a vast array of organic, bioorganic, and                        organometallic molecules.  The acquisition of instrumentation                   capable of carrying out these state-of-the-art techniques is                    essential for the prosecution of frontier research in several                   fields of chemistry and biology.                                                                                                                                The purchase of an analytical high resolution mass spectrometer                 will be facilitated by support from the Chemistry Shared                        Instrumentation Program and the Biological Instrumentation                      Program.  The areas of chemistry and biology that will be                       enhanced include:                                                                                                                                                  1) Determination of Organic Structures and Reaction                                Mechanisms                                                                   2) Reaction Pathways in Polynuclear Metal Carbonyls                             3) Stereoselective Synthesis and Characterization of                               Natural Products                                                             4) Auto-oxidation of Cobalt Dioxygen Complexes                                  5) Mass Spectrometric Probes of Enzyme Structures and                              Mechanisms                                                                   6) Studies on the Dissociation Dynamics of Large Molecules                      7) Applications of Mass Spectrometry to Biochemistry and                           Toxicology                                                                   8) Model Systems for Biological Oxidation Reactions                             9) Characterization of Biologically Important Molecules
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Mathematical and Physical Sciences
